name: VEON Ltd.
bossPosition: Group Chief Corporate and Public Affairs Officer
goal:
VEON is a NASDAQ and Euronext Amsterdam-listed global provider of connectivity and internet services, with the ambition to lead the personal internet revolution for over 235 million customers it currently serves, and many others in the years to come. VEON is both the new name of the company and of our new personal digital platform, which we intend to deploy across all our markets in the coming year.
Our governance structure is designed to promote integrity in everything we do, and we are committed to responsible and effective governance as a core element of our culture.
VEON is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and operates in Italy, Russia, Ukraine, Algeria, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Georgia, Armenia, Kyrgyzstan and Tajikistan under the “WindTre”, "Beeline", "Kyivstar", “Djezzy”, “Jazz” and “Banglalink” brands .
Across the 12 Countries where VEON is present, our promise to customers is to find the best market solution to address their business needs, ensuring it is fully integrated and delivered in the most efficient manner – for every customer, every time.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: digital single market, electronic communications code, data protection and privacy, net neutrality, payment services, Digital Agenda 2020, cyber security, competition law and policy, state aid, AVMS.
